at.itb13.oculus.application

Class ControllerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.itb13.oculus.application.ControllerFactory

  • public class ControllerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The ControllerFactory provides the access to controllers of the application layer. His task is to instance controllers and returns the controller with limited methods defined in its interface.
